text: Joseph Michael "Joe" McDade (September 29, 1931 - September 24, 2017) was an American politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives, having represented Pennsylvania's 10th congressional district from 1963 through 1999 as a Republican.Political Graveyard: The Political Graveyard McDade died on September 24, 2017 in Fairfax, Virginia of heart failure at the age of 85.'Former congressman Joseph McDade dies,' The Times- Tribune, Borys Krawczenuik, September 25, 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Photo of Congressman Joseph McDade * Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Scranton, Pennsylvania
title: Joseph M. McDade
